name: TotalTraffic-AugustaGA
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Total Traffic provides the most convenient way to get your traffic updates at home and is available in over 100 major cities nationwide.

This flash briefing plays a radio-style traffic report of the current traffic in the Augusta, GA area and is updated multiple times during the day to give you the most accurate picture of your local traffic. 

It's a natural addition to your Flash Briefing playlist and will keep you updated as you're getting ready in the morning or on your way out the door later in the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
